Key.Original: You successfully extracted the crew, but Kilo 1 were forced to destroy the helicopter themselves. The actions of the AAF after the fact, however, remain questionable.
Key.Chinese: 你成功救出了機組員，但把摧毀直升機的工作留給了"基洛 1"。AAF在最後的行動令我們深感疑問，仍有許多問題需被調查。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你成功救出了机组员，但把摧毁直升机的工作留给了 "基洛 1"。然而 AAF 在最后的行动仍值得推敲。

Key.Original: You successfully extracted the crew, but you failed to destroy the helicopter. The actions of the AAF after the fact, however, remain questionable.
Key.Chinese: 你成功救出了機組員，但沒能摧毀直升機。阿爾蒂斯武裝力量在最後的行動令我們深感疑問，仍有許多問題需被調查。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你成功救出了机组员，但没能摧毁直升机。然而 AAF 在最后的行动仍值得推敲。

Key.Original: The AAF helicopter was destroyed and the crew were safely extracted. The actions of the AAF after the fact, however, remain questionable.
Key.Chinese: 阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的直升機已成功摧毀，並也順利救出機組員。但阿爾蒂斯武裝力量在最後的行動令我們深感疑問，仍有許多問題需被調查。
Key.Chinesesimp: AAF 的直升机已成功摧毁，并也顺利救出机组员。然而 AAF 在最后的行动仍值得推敲。

Key.Original: The Crew are Dead!
Key.Chinese: 機組員已陣亡!
Key.Chinesesimp: 机组员已阵亡！

Key.Original: All Players are Dead!
Key.Chinese: 所有玩家已陣亡!
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有玩家已阵亡！

Key.Original: At 1815 hours this evening, a WY-55 Hellcat belonging to the AAF was %1shot down%2 on return from counter-insurgency operations in the northwest. Only the crew were present in the helicopter when it went down, but now they're trapped by the FIA who are closing in on their position.%3The AAF have requested NATO's assistance. As such, %4Kilo 1 and 2%5, and %6Romeo 1 and 2%7, are being deployed to conduct search and rescue on the AAF crew.%8A recon team, callsign Foxtrot, are already on station %9above the crash site%10, awaiting your arrival. They will assist you with dispatching the helicopter and locating the crew.
Key.Chinese: 在傍晚18:15時分，一架屬於阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的WY-55"潑婦"，在任務結束回程的路上被%1擊落%2。當時機上只有機組員，他們現在被自由獨立同盟困在墜毀點。%3阿爾蒂斯武裝力量已請求北約進行協助。因為如此，%4"基洛 1"和2%5，還有%6"羅密歐"1"和"2"%7，將被派往執行阿爾蒂斯武裝力量機組員的搜救任務。%8一個呼號叫Foxtrot的偵察小隊已經抵達%9墜毀點附近%10，正等待你們的抵達。他們將協助你們搜索直升機並定位機組員位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在傍晚18：15时分，一架属于 AAF 的 WY-55"泼妇"直升机，在任务结束回程中被%1击落%2。当时机上只有机组员，他们现在被 FIA 困在坠毁点。%3AAF 已请求北约进行协助。因为如此，%4"基洛 1"和2%5，还有%6"罗密欧 1"和"2"%7，将被派往执行 AAF 机组员的搜救任务。%8一个呼号叫 Foxtrot 的侦察小队已经抵达%9坠毁点附近%10，正等待你们的抵达。他们将协助你们搜索直升机并定位机组员位置。

Key.Original: At 1815 hours this evening, a WY-55 Hellcat belonging to the AAF was %1shot down%2 on return from counter-insurgency operations in the northwest. Only the crew were present in the helicopter when it went down, but now they're trapped by the FIA who are closing in on their position.%3The AAF have requested NATO's assistance. As such, %4Kilo 1 and 2%5, and %6Romeo 1 and 2%7, are being deployed to conduct search and rescue on the AAF crew.
Key.Chinese: 在傍晚18:15時分，一架屬於阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的WY-55"潑婦"，在任務結束回程的路上被%1擊落%2。當時機上只有機組員，他們現在被自由獨立同盟困在墜毀點。%3阿爾蒂斯武裝力量已請求北約進行協助。因為如此，%4Kilo1"和2%5，還有%6"羅密歐"1"和"2"%7，將被派往執行阿爾蒂斯武裝力量機組員的搜救任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在傍晚18：15时分，一架属于 AAF 的 WY-55"泼妇"直升机，在任务结束回程中被%1击落%2。当时机上只有机组员，他们现在被 FIA 困在坠毁点。%3AAF 已请求北约进行协助。因为如此，%4"基洛 1"和2%5，还有%6"罗密欧 1"和"2"%7，将被派往执行 AAF 机组员的搜救任务。

Key.Original: %1Kilo 1%2 - Lead element.%3%4Kilo 2%5 - Your team.%6%7Romeo%8 - Transport MH-9 Hummingbirds.%9Broadway - Headquarters.%10%11Foxtrot%12 - Recon element.%13Archangel - Inbound Greyhawk UAV.
Key.Chinese: %1"基洛 1"%2-指揮小隊。%3%4"基洛 2"%5-你的小隊。%6%7"羅密歐"%8-MH-9"蜂鳥"運輸直升機。%9"百老匯"-指揮部。%10%11Foxtrot%12-偵察小隊。%13"大天使"-準備支援的"灰鷹"無人偵察機。
Key.Chinesesimp: %1"基洛 1"%2-指挥分队%3%4"基洛 2"%5-你的小组。%6%7Romeo%8-MH-9"蜂鸟"运输直升机。%9"百老汇"-指挥部。%10%11Foxtrot%12-侦察分队。%13"大天使"-准备支援的"灰鹰"无人机。

Key.Original: %1Kilo 1%2 - Lead element.%3%4Kilo 2%5 - Your team.%6%7Romeo%8 - Transport MH-9 Hummingbirds.%9Broadway - Headquarters.%10Archangel - Inbound Greyhawk UAV.
Key.Chinese: %1"基洛 1"%2-指揮小隊。%3%4"基洛 2"%5-你的小隊。%6%7"羅密歐"%8-MH-9"蜂鳥"運輸直升機。%9"百老匯"-指揮部。%10"大天使"-準備支援的"灰鷹"無人偵察機。
Key.Chinesesimp: %1"基洛 1"%2-指挥分队%3%4"基洛 2"%5-你的小组。%6%7Romeo%8-MH-9"蜂鸟"运输直升机。%9"百老汇"-指挥部%10"大天使"-准备支援的"灰鹰"无人机。

Key.Original: %1Romeo 1%2 and %3Romeo 2%4 will transport you to %5the crash site%6, where upon you will conduct search and rescue for the downed AAF helicopter's crew. Upon their safe extraction, you are to destroy the wreckage of the helicopter to prevent it from falling into the hands of the FIA.
Key.Chinese: %1"羅密歐"1%2和%3"羅密歐"2%4將帶你們前往%5墜機點%6，你們將在那裡進行搜救阿爾蒂斯武裝力量直升機機組員的任務。在救出機組員後，你們必須摧毀直升機，避免其落入自由獨立同盟之手。
Key.Chinesesimp: %1Romeo1%2和%3Romeo2%4将带你们前往%5坠机点%6，你们将在那里进行搜救 AAF 直升机机组员的任务。在救出机组员后，你们必须摧毁直升机，避免其落入 FIA 之手。

Key.Original:
1. Move to the crash site.
2. Extract the AAF crew.
3. Destroy the helicopter.
Key.Chinese:
1. 前往墜機點。
2. 救出阿爾蒂斯武裝力量機組員。
3. 摧毀直升機。
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 前往坠机点。
2. 救出 AAF 机组员。
3. 摧毁直升机。

Key.Original: Follow the ROE
Key.Chinese: 遵守交戰守則
Key.Chinesesimp: 遵守交战守则

Key.Original: Follow the Rules of Engagement. Do not fire unless fired upon.
Key.Chinese: 遵守交戰守則。在敵人開火前不準主動開火。
Key.Chinesesimp: 遵守交战守则。不准先开第一枪。

Key.Original: Locate the Crash Site
Key.Chinese: 定位墜機點
Key.Chinesesimp: 定位坠机点

Key.Original: Search %1the indicated area%2 for the downed AAF helicopter.
Key.Chinese: 搜索%1指定的區域%2來找到墜毀的阿爾蒂斯武裝力量直升機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜索%1指定的区域%2来找到坠毁的 AAF 直升机。

Key.Original: Search the Outpost
Key.Chinese: 搜索前哨
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜索前哨

Key.Original: SEARCH
Key.Chinese: 搜索
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜索

Key.Original: Search %1the outpost%2 for the AAF helicopter crew.
Key.Chinese: 搜索%1前哨%2，尋找阿爾蒂斯武裝力量直升機機組員。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜索%1前哨%2，寻找 AAF 直升机机组员。

Key.Original: Search the Gas Station
Key.Chinese: 搜索加油站
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜索加油站

Key.Original: SEARCH
Key.Chinese: 搜索
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜索

Key.Original: Search %1the gas station%2 for the AAF helicopter crew.
Key.Chinese: 搜索%1加油站%2，尋找阿爾蒂斯武裝力量直升機機組員。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜索%1加油站%2，寻找 AAF 直升机机组员。

Key.Original: Extract
Key.Chinese: 撤離
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤离

Key.Original: EXTRACT
Key.Chinese: 撤離
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤离

Key.Original: Await UH-80 Ghost Hawk extraction, callsign Thunder.
Key.Chinese: 等待UH-80"鬼鷹"運輸直升機進行撤離，它的呼號是"雷電"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待 UH-80"幽灵鹰"运输直升机进行撤离，它的呼号是"雷电"。

Key.Original: Destroy the Helicopter
Key.Chinese: 摧毀直升機
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁直升机

Key.Original: Destroy the downed AAF helicopter to prevent it from falling into FIA hands.
Key.Chinese: 摧毀墜毀的阿爾蒂斯武裝力量直升機，避免其落入自由獨立同盟之手。
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁坠毁的 AAF 直升机，避免其落入 FIA 之手。

Container.name: x15_UAV_Punish
Container.situation: players failed to destroy the wreck in time

Key.Original: Damnit, I'm taking over! Weapons hot!
Key.Chinese: 天殺的，我接管指揮!開火!
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的，我来接管！开始射击！

Container.name: x10_UAV_Warning
Container.situation: players are taking too long to destroy the helicopter wreck

Key.Original: Kilo 2, our window's closing! Connect to Archangel and destroy that wreck!
Key.Chinese: "基洛 2"，我們正在失去機會!快點連接"大天使"並摧毀殘骸!
Key.Chinesesimp: "基洛 2"，我们正在失去机会！快点连接"大天使"并摧毁残骸！

Container.name: x05_UAV_No_Ammo
Container.situation: the players failed to destroy the wreckage before the uav ran out of ammo. feeds into 23_orders

Key.Original: Kilo, Archangel's empty.
Key.Chinese: Kilo，"大天使"彈藥已用完。
Key.Chinesesimp: Kilo，"大天使"弹药已用完。

Key.Original: The technicals split up. We've got 3 potential locations in the vicinity of Syrta.
Key.Chinese: 剛剛的武裝越野車分散了。我們掌握了3個在西爾塔城市可能的位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 刚刚的武装越野车分散了。我们在西尔塔城内掌握了三处可能位置。

Container.name: x01_ROE_Failed
Container.situation: one of the players opened fire before they were supposed to

Key.Original: Kilo 2, cease fire Goddammit!
Key.Chinese: "基洛 2"，天殺的快停火!
Key.Chinesesimp: "基洛 2"，天杀的快停火！

Container.name: 50_Artillery
Container.participants: MARK B Team A;MARK B HQ;
Container.situation: friendly artillery starts hitting the civilian town

Key.Original: Understood, Kilo 1. It's not us. Checking with AAF command. Wait one.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"基洛 1"。那不是我們幹的。正在與AAF指揮官確認中。請稍等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"基洛 1"。那不是我们干的。正在与 AAF 指挥部确认中。请稍等。

Key.Original: Confirmed, Kilo 1. It's the AAF. We've advised them to cease fire. It's on them now. How copy?
Key.Chinese: 確認了，"基洛 1"。是阿爾蒂斯武裝力量幹的。我們已建議他們停火。但只能由他們決定。有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 确认了，"基洛 1"。是 AAF 干的。我们已建议他们停火。但只能由他们决定。有收到吗？

Key.Original: Woah! What the fuck?!
Key.Chinese: 哇嗚!搞啥鬼?!
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔！搞什么狗屁？！

Key.Original: Broadway, Kilo 1. Syrta's being pounded by artillery! Please advise, over.
Key.Chinese: "百老匯"，"基洛 1"。西爾塔正被火炮轟炸!請指示，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "百老汇"，"基洛 1"。西尔塔正遭到炮击！请指示，完毕。

Key.Original: There are civilians down there...
Key.Chinese: 那裡還有一般平民...
Key.Chinesesimp: 那里还有一般平民...

Key.Original: Jesus Christ...
Key.Chinese: 天殺的...
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的...

Key.Original: Affirmative, Broadway. Kilo out.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"百老匯"。Kilo通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"百老汇"。Kilo 通话完毕。

Container.name: 45_Extracted
Container.participants: MARK B Team A;MARK B HQ;
Container.situation: all units have successfully extracted from the area

Key.Original: Outstanding. Relaying to AAF command. Broadway out.
Key.Chinese: 幹得好。我們會通知阿爾蒂斯武裝力量的指揮官。"百老匯"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干得好。我们会通知 AAF 的指挥官。"百老汇"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Broadway, be advised, Kilo is RTB with the package in tow. How copy?
Key.Chinese: "百老匯"，請注意，Kilo正帶著人質返回基地。有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "百老汇"，请注意，Kilo 正带着人质返回基地。有收到吗？

Container.name: 40_All_In
Container.situation: all units have boarded the helicopter

Key.Original: We're in! Go! Go!
Key.Chinese: 我們都進來了!走!走!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们都进来了！走！走！

Container.name: 35_Crew_Found
Container.participants: MARK B Team A;MARK B HQ;
Container.situation: helicopter crew rescued by sf teams

Key.Original: Confirmed, Kilo 1. Thunder is inbound. ETA 30 seconds. How copy?
Key.Chinese: 了解，"基洛 1"。"雷電"在路上了。預計30秒後抵達。有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"基洛 1"。"雷电"马上就位。预计30秒后抵达。有收到吗？

Key.Original: Broadway, Kilo 1. Be advised, Kilo 2 have secured the package. Requesting extract, over.
Key.Chinese: "百老匯"，"基洛 1"。請注意，"基洛 2"已掌握了人質。請求進行撤離，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "百老汇"，"基洛 1"。请注意，"基洛 2"已掌握了人质。请求进行撤离，完毕。

Key.Original: Solid copy, Broadway. We'll prep the LZ. Kilo out.
Key.Chinese: 完整收到，"百老匯"。我們正在預備降落點。Kilo通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 完整收到，"百老汇"。我们正在预备降落点。Kilo 通话完毕。

Container.name: 33_Church_Clear
Container.situation: the other team has cleared the church but found no hostages

Key.Original: Kilo 1 to Kilo 2, the church is clear. No sign of the hostages. Starting our sweep. Kilo 1 out.
Key.Chinese: "基洛 1"呼叫"基洛 2"，教堂已肅清。沒有發現到人質。我們將開始掃蕩附近。"基洛 1"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "基洛 1"呼叫 "基洛 2"，教堂已肃清。没有发现到人质。我们将开始扫荡附近。Kilo1"通话完毕。

Container.name: 32_Church_Contact
Container.situation: the other team starts engaging enemies at the church

Key.Original: Kilo 2, Kilo 1 has contacts at the church. Engaging. Out.
Key.Chinese: "基洛 2"，"基洛 1"已在教堂接敵。交戰中。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "基洛 2"，"基洛 1"已在教堂接敌。交战中。通话完毕。

Container.name: 30_Bug_Out
Container.participants: MARK B Heli;MARK B HQ;MARK B Team A;
Container.situation: helicopter on overwatch forced to return to base

Key.Original: Understood, Romeo 1.
Key.Chinese: 了解，Romeo1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"罗密欧 1"。

Key.Original: Kilo, be advised, UH-80 Ghost Hawk extraction on standby. Callsign Thunder. How copy?
Key.Chinese: Kilo，請注意，UH-80"鬼鷹"運輸直升機已準備進行撤離任務。它的呼號是"雷電"。有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: Kilo，请注意，UH-80"幽灵鹰"运输直升机已准备进行撤离任务。它的呼号是"雷电"。有收到吗？

Key.Original: Kilo 1, the town's swarming with hostiles. They're definitely concentrated around the 3 points Broadway mentioned.
Key.Chinese: "基洛 1"，城鎮中充滿了敵人。而"百老匯"提到的3處地點肯定也擠滿了人。
Key.Chinesesimp: "基洛 1"，城镇中充满了敌人。而他们肯定集中在"百老汇"提到的3处地点内。

Key.Original: No eyes on the crew, though. They must be in one of the buildings.
Key.Chinese: 我們沒有發現到機組員。他們肯定是被挾持在其中一個建築物裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们没有发现到机组员。他们肯定是被挟持在其中一个建筑物里。

Key.Original: Shit! Taking fire!
Key.Chinese: 該死!遭遇攻擊!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死！遭遇攻击！

Key.Original: Kilo, you've got at least one technical at the gas station!
Key.Chinese: Kilo，你至少會在加油站遭遇武裝越野車!
Key.Chinesesimp: Kilo，你至少会在加油站遭遇武装越野车！

Key.Original: Fuck! Fuel line's ruptured!
Key.Chinese: 幹!油管破裂!
Key.Chinesesimp: 操！油管破裂！

Key.Original: Broadway, Romeo 1, we've got a punctured fuel line! We are RTB! How copy?
Key.Chinese: "百老匯"，"羅密歐"1"，我們的油管破裂了!我們要返回基地!有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "百老汇"，"罗密欧 1"，我们的油管破裂了！我们要返回基地！有收到吗？

Key.Original: Copy, Broadway. Kilo out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"百老匯"。Kilo通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"百老汇"。Kilo 通话完毕。

Container.name: 25_Plan
Container.participants: MARK B Team A;MARK B HQ;MARK B Heli;
Container.situation: sf team inserted, reiterates the plan

Key.Original: Solid copy, Kilo 1.
Key.Chinese: 完整收到，"基洛 1"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 完整收到，"基洛 1"。

Key.Original: Kilo 1, I'm going to do a quick flyby over the town and see what I can see. I'll relay it back to you. How copy?
Key.Chinese: "基洛 1"，我將會快速飛過小鎮，看看有沒有能看到的東西。我會向你回報。有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "基洛 1"，我将会快速飞过小镇，看看有没有能看到的东西。我会向你回报。有收到吗？

Key.Original: Broadway, Kilo 1. Boots on the ground, proceeding with main objective. How copy?
Key.Chinese: "百老匯"，"基洛 1"。小隊已著陸，開始執行任務。有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "百老汇"，"基洛 1"。小队已着陆，开始执行主要目标。有收到吗？

Key.Original: Kilo 2, circle west and take the gas station and outpost. We'll take the church.
Key.Chinese: "基洛 2"，從西方迂迴並前往加油站與前哨。我們這邊會去教堂那。
Key.Chinesesimp: "基洛 2"，从西方迂回并前往加油站与前哨。我们这边会去教堂那。

Key.Original: Watch out for civilians and the hostages.
Key.Chinese: 請注意平民與人質。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请注意平民与人质。

Key.Original: Kilo 1 copies all. Much appreciated. Out.
Key.Chinese: "基洛 1"完整收到。非常感謝。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "基洛 1"全部收到。非常感谢。通话完毕。

Container.name: 23_Orders
Container.participants: MARK B HQ;MARK B Team A;MARK B Heli;
Container.situation: hq issues new orders

Key.Original: Standby for tasking.
Key.Chinese: 準備接收任務命令。
Key.Chinesesimp: 准备接收任务命令。

Key.Original: Romeo, drop Kilo at Syrta. Kilo, you are to sweep the town and locate the crew.
Key.Chinese: "羅密歐"，把Kilo投放在西爾塔。Kilo，你們將掃蕩小鎮並搜索機組員。
Key.Chinesesimp: Romeo，把 Kilo 投放在"西尔塔"。Kilo，你们将扫荡小镇并搜索机组员。

Key.Original: The 3 locations are: one church, grid 086 183.
Key.Chinese: 3個可能的位置如下:一座教堂，座標086183。
Key.Chinesesimp: 3个可能的位置如下：一座教堂，座标086183。

Key.Original: Standing by to copy.
Key.Chinese: 等待接收中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待接收中。

Key.Original: One gas station, grid 084 182.
Key.Chinese: 一個加油站，座標084182。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个加油站，座标084182。

Key.Original: One outpost, grid 083 182. How copy?
Key.Chinese: 一處前哨，座標083182。有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 一处前哨，座标083182。有收到吗？

Key.Original: Copy, Romeo 1. Romeo 2, RTB after unloading Kilo 1.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"羅密歐"1"。"羅密歐"2"，請等待卸載完"基洛 1"後就返回基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"罗密欧 1"。"罗密欧 2"，请等待卸载完 "基洛 1"后就返回基地。

Key.Original: Kilo, we'll arrange alternate extraction for you. Further info to follow at a later time. How copy?
Key.Chinese: Kilo，我們會為你們安排撤離計劃。等下就會告知你們。有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: Kilo，我们会为你们安排撤离计划。等下就会告知你们。有收到吗？

Key.Original: Kilo copies all. En route.
Key.Chinese: Kilo完整抄收。正在路上了。
Key.Chinesesimp: Kilo 全部收到。正在路上了。

Key.Original: Broadway, Romeo 2's pretty banged up. Please advise, over.
Key.Chinese: "百老匯"，"羅密歐"2"受損嚴重。請指示，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "百老汇"，"罗密欧 2"受损严重。请指示，完毕。

Key.Original: Solid copy, Broadway. Kilo out.
Key.Chinese: 完整收到，"百老匯"。Kilo通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 完整收到，"百老汇"。Kilo 通话完毕。

Container.name: 20_Destroyed
Container.participants: MARK B Team A;MARK B HQ;
Container.situation: the downed helicopter wreckage was destroyed. feeds into 23_orders

Key.Original: Copy, Kilo 1. The technicals split up. We've got 3 potential locations in the vicinity of Syrta.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"基洛 1"。剛剛的武裝越野車分散了。我們掌握了3個在西爾塔城市可能的位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"基洛 1"。刚刚的武装越野车分散了。我们掌握了3个在西尔塔城内可能的位置。

Key.Original: Broadway, wreckage neutralized. Where are the crew? Over.
Key.Chinese: "百老匯"，殘骸已摧毀。機組員的下落呢?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "百老汇"，残骸已摧毁。机组员的下落呢？完毕。

Container.name: 20b_Destroyed_Remote
Container.participants: MARK B Team A;MARK B HQ;
Container.situation: the downed helicopter wreckage was destroyed. feeds into 23_orders

Key.Original: Copy, Kilo 1. The technicals split up. Foxtrot have 3 potential locations in the vicinity of Syrta.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"基洛 1"。剛剛的武裝越野車分散了。Foxtrot掌握了3個在西爾塔城市可能的位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"基洛 1"。刚刚的武装越野车分散了。Foxtrot 掌握了3个在西尔塔城内可能的位置。

Key.Original: Broadway, wreckage neutralized. Where are the crew? Over.
Key.Chinese: "百老匯"，殘骸已摧毀。機組員的下落呢?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "百老汇"，残骸已摧毁。机组员的下落呢？完毕。

Container.name: 15_Technical
Container.participants: MARK B Heli;MARK B Team A;MARK B HQ;
Container.situation: helicopters spot an armed enemy vehicle and have to pull back

Key.Original: 10 seconds, Kilo 1. Transferring weapons authority. Wait one.
Key.Chinese: 10秒，"基洛 1"。正在轉移武器使用權限。請稍等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 10秒，"基洛 1"。正在转移武器使用权限。请稍等。

Key.Original: Kilo 1, Archangel's armed and standing by to engage. Over.
Key.Chinese: "基洛 1"，"大天使"已啟動武器系統並準備攻擊。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "基洛 1"，"大天使"已启动武器系统并准备攻击。完毕。

Key.Original: We've got a technical down there!
Key.Chinese: 下面有武裝越野車!
Key.Chinesesimp: 下面有武装越野车！

Key.Original: Get us out of here!
Key.Chinese: 快帶我們離開這裡!
Key.Chinesesimp: 快带我们离开这里！

Key.Original: Broadway, what's the 20 on Archangel?
Key.Chinese: "百老匯"，"大天使"上面有武器嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "百老汇"，"大天使"上面有武器吗？

Key.Original: Solid copy, Broadway.
Key.Chinese: 完整收到，"百老匯"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 完整收到，"百老汇"。

Key.Original: Copy, Broadway.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"百老匯"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"百老汇"。

Key.Original: Someone connect to Archangel and take out that helicopter!
Key.Chinese: 來人阿，快去連接"大天使"並摧毀掉那架直升機!
Key.Chinesesimp: 谁快去连接"大天使"并摧毁掉那架直升机！

Container.name: 15b_Technical_Remote
Container.participants: MARK B Heli;MARK B Team A;MARK B HQ;
Container.situation: helicopters spot an armed enemy vehicle and have to pull back

Key.Original: 10 seconds, Kilo 1. Transferring weapons authority. Wait one.
Key.Chinese: 10秒，"基洛 1"。正在轉移武器使用權限。請稍等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 10秒，"基洛 1"。正在转移武器使用权限。请稍等。

Key.Original: Kilo 1, Archangel's armed and awaiting target confirmation. Over.
Key.Chinese: "基洛 1"，"大天使"已啟動武器系統並等待瞄準目標。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "基洛 1"，"大天使"已启动武器系统等待目标确认。完毕。

Key.Original: We've got a technical down there!
Key.Chinese: 下面有武裝越野車!
Key.Chinesesimp: 下面有武装越野车！

Key.Original: Get us out of here!
Key.Chinese: 快帶我們離開這裡!
Key.Chinesesimp: 快带我们离开这里！

Key.Original: Broadway, what's the 20 on Archangel?
Key.Chinese: "百老匯"，"大天使"上面有武器嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "百老汇"，"大天使"上面有武器吗？

Key.Original: Solid copy, Broadway.
Key.Chinese: 完整收到，"百老匯"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 完整收到，"百老汇"。

Key.Original: Copy, Broadway.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"百老匯"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"百老汇"。

Key.Original: Someone connect to Foxtrot's camera and designate that helicopter!
Key.Chinese: 來人阿，快去連接Foxtrot的雷射指示器並標定那架直升機!
Key.Chinesesimp: 谁快去连接 Foxtrot 的激光指示器并照射那架直升机！

Container.name: 10_Located
Container.participants: MARK B Team A;MARK B Heli;MARK B HQ;
Container.situation: helicopters spot the downed helicopter that they're looking for

Key.Original: Kilo 1, Broadway. Understood. Video feed from Archangel confirms that the hostages are no longer at the crash site. You're clear to engage all targets. Over.
Key.Chinese: "基洛 1"，"百老匯"。了解。根據"大天使"的偵察畫面，我們確認人質已不在墜機點了。你們可以開始攻擊敵人。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "基洛 1"，"百老汇"。了解。根据"大天使"的侦察画面，我们确认人质已不在坠机点了。你们可以开始攻击敌人。完毕。

Key.Original: Taking fire, here!
Key.Chinese: 這裡遭遇攻擊!
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里遭遇攻击！

Key.Original: Broadway, Kilo 1. We've got eyes on.
Key.Chinese: "百老匯"，"基洛 1"。我們看到目標了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "百老汇"，"基洛 1"。我们看到目标了。

Key.Original: Broadway, we're taking small arms fire. We are returning fire.
Key.Chinese: "百老匯"，我們遭受到小型武器的攻擊。我們正在回擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: "百老汇"，我们遭受到小型武器的攻击。我们正在回击。

Container.name: 10b_Located_Remote
Container.participants: MARK B Team A;MARK B Heli;MARK B HQ;
Container.situation: helicopters spot the downed helicopter that they're looking for

Key.Original: Kilo 1, Broadway. Understood. Foxtrot confirms that the hostages are no longer at the crash site. You're clear to engage all targets. Over.
Key.Chinese: "基洛 1"，"百老匯"。了解。Foxtrot確認人質已不在墜機點了。你們可以開始攻擊敵人。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "基洛 1"，"百老汇"。了解。Foxtrot 确认人质已不在坠机点了。你们可以开始攻击敌人。完毕。

Key.Original: Taking fire, here!
Key.Chinese: 這裡遭遇攻擊!
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里遭遇攻击！

Key.Original: Broadway, Kilo 1. We've got eyes on.
Key.Chinese: "百老匯"，"基洛 1"。我們看到目標了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "百老汇"，"基洛 1"。我们看到目标了。

Key.Original: Broadway, we're taking small arms fire. We are returning fire.
Key.Chinese: "百老匯"，我們遭受到小型武器的攻擊。我們正在回擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: "百老汇"，我们遭受到轻武器攻击。我们正在还击。

Container.name: 05_Sentries
Container.participants: MARK B Team A;MARK B HQ;
Container.situation: helicopters spot the enemy sentries from earlier

Key.Original: Solid copy. Remember the ROE - do not fire unless fired upon. Akhanteros is on edge as it is. Over.
Key.Chinese: 完整收到。請謹記交戰守則-不要主動開火，除非他們對你開火的話。阿坎斯特羅斯正在那附近。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 完整收到。请谨记交战守则—绝不先开第一枪。阿坎特罗斯很在意这件事。完毕。

Key.Original: Broadway, we have eyes on sentries. Two victors, grid square 10 17, southbound. How copy?
Key.Chinese: "百老匯"，我們發現到有哨兵。在座標1017附近，靠近南面。有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: "百老汇"，我们发现到有哨兵。在座标1017附近，靠近南面。有收到吗？

Key.Original: Nothing new there, then...
Key.Chinese: 那裡沒啥新東西，然後...
Key.Chinesesimp: 那里没啥新东西，然后...

Key.Original: Understood, Broadway. Kilo 1 out.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"百老匯"。"基洛 1"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"百老汇"。"基洛 1"通话完毕。

Container.name: 01_Spotted
Container.participants: MARK B HQ;MARK B Team A;
Container.situation: helicopters are spotted by enemy sentries

Key.Original: Acknowledged. UAV recon, callsign 'Archangel', reports 3 FIA technicals leaving the vicinity of the helo wreck. Looks like you've been spotted. Over.
Key.Chinese: 了解。據呼號為'大天使'的無人偵察機回報，有3輛自由獨立同盟的武裝越野車駛離了殘骸。看來你們被發現了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。据呼号为'大天使'的无人侦察机回报，有3辆 FIA 的武装越野车驶离了残骸。看来你们被发现了。完毕。

Key.Original: It's possible they have the AAF crew members on board. Their command's getting antsy. We'll keep you updated. Broadway out.
Key.Chinese: AAF機組員很有可能已經被載走。他們的指揮官越來越煩躁了。我們將持續更新情報。"百老匯"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: AAF 机组员很有可能已经被载走。他们的指挥部越来越烦躁了。我们将持续更新情报。"百老汇"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Broadway, Kilo 1. Be advised, we're a minute out from the crash site. Over.
Key.Chinese: "百老匯"，"基洛 1"。請注意，我們將在一分鐘內抵達墜機點。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "百老汇"，"基洛 1"。请注意，我们将在一分钟内抵达坠机点。完毕。

Key.Original: Copy, Broadway. What's the word on the hostages? Over.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"百老匯"。那人質呢?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"百老汇"。那人质呢？完毕。

Container.name: 01b_Spotted_Remote
Container.participants: MARK B HQ;MARK B Team A;
Container.situation: helicopters are spotted by enemy sentries

Key.Original: Acknowledged. Looks like you've been spotted. Foxtrot's pursuing 3 FIA technicals leaving the vicinity of the helo wreck. Over.
Key.Chinese: 了解。看來你們被發現了。Foxtrot正在追擊3輛駛離殘骸的自由獨立同盟武裝越野車。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。看来你们被发现了。Foxtrot 正在追踪3辆驶离残骸的 FIA 武装越野车。完毕。

Key.Original: Foxtrot thinks the AAF crew members are in the technicals. AAF command's getting antsy. We'll keep you updated. Broadway out.
Key.Chinese: Foxtrot認為AAF的機組員就在那些車輛上。他們的指揮官越來越煩躁了。我們將持續更新情報。"百老匯"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Foxtrot 认为 AAF 的机组员就在那些车辆上。他们的指挥部越来越烦躁了。我们将持续更新情报。"百老汇"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Broadway, Kilo 1. Be advised, we're a minute out from the crash site. Over.
Key.Chinese: "百老匯"，"基洛 1"。請注意，我們將在一分鐘內抵達墜機點。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "百老汇"，"基洛 1"。请注意，我们将在一分钟内抵达坠机点。完毕。

Key.Original: Copy, Broadway. What's the word on the hostages? Over.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"百老匯"。那人質呢?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"百老汇"。那人质呢？完毕。

Key.Original: Marksmen
Key.Chinese: 精準射手
Key.Chinesesimp: 精准射手

Container.name: x01_Losses
Container.situation: support team has been annihilated

Key.Original: Viper-Black, we have lost contact with Viper-Green. Presumed KIA. You are on your own. Viper-Red out.
Key.Chinese: "毒蛇-黑"，我們與"毒蛇-綠"失去連繫。推測他們已經陣亡。你只能靠你自己了。"毒蛇-紅"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "毒蛇-$1"，我们与"毒蛇-$1"失去联系。推测他们已经阵亡。你只能靠你自己了。"毒蛇-$1"通话完毕。

Container.name: 50_Victory
Container.situation: player secured the complex

Key.Original: Understood, Viper-Black. Hydra is inbound. Viper-Red out.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"毒蛇-黑"。"九頭蛇"正在路上。"毒蛇-紅"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"毒蛇-$1"。"九头蛇"正在路上。"毒蛇-$1"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Commander, the complex is ours. You can send in Hydra. Over.
Key.Chinese: 指揮官，營地是我們的了。你可以讓"九頭蛇"過來了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 指挥官，营地是我们的了。你可以让"九头蛇"过来了。完毕。

Container.name: 45_Signal
Container.situation: player gives supporting team the signal to attack

Key.Original: Viper-Green, Viper-Black - engage when ready! Engage when ready! Out.
Key.Chinese: "毒蛇-綠"，"毒蛇-黑"-可以開始進攻!可以開始進攻!通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "毒蛇-$1"，"毒蛇-$1"-准备好了就攻击！准备好了就攻击！通话完毕。

Container.name: 40_LiveFeed
Container.situation: player's leader informing them of the incoming uav feed

Key.Original: Viper-Black, standby for UAV video feed.
Key.Chinese: "毒蛇-黑"，請接收無人偵察機畫面。
Key.Chinesesimp: "毒蛇-$1"，请接收无人侦察机画面。

Container.name: 35_CampInfo
Container.situation: player's leader gives them even more info on the objective

Key.Original: Roger. Viper-Green is standing by.
Key.Chinese: 了解。"毒蛇-綠"正在待命。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。"毒蛇-$1"正在待命。

Key.Original: Recon places 2 hostiles patrolling the perimeter of the complex. The remaining insurgent forces have established defensive positions within the complex itself.
Key.Chinese: 偵察回報有2個小隊在營區附近巡邏。其餘的敵人則在工業區內設立防守陣地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 侦察回报有2名敌人在营区附近巡逻。其余的敌人则在工业区内设立防守阵地。

Key.Original: Viper-Black on the ground.
Key.Chinese: "毒蛇-黑"已抵達。
Key.Chinesesimp: "毒蛇-$1"已抵达。

Key.Original: There is a small barricade to the south, possibly with a static weapon emplacement. If that is the case, make this your primary target. Over.
Key.Chinese: 在南方有一個小路障，可能設有固定式武器。假使真有的話，請把它當作是你的優先目標。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在南方有一个小街垒，可能设有固定式武器。假使真有的话，请把它当作是你的优先目标。完毕。

Key.Original: Roger. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。通话完毕。

Container.name: 30_Details
Container.situation: player receives more information on their new objective

Key.Original: Okay, here is the situation. The camp is in a small industrial complex north of Alikampos.
Key.Chinese: 好的，狀況如下。該營地設立在阿利卡姆波斯北方的小工業區裡面。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，状况如下。该营地设立在阿利卡姆波斯北方的小工业区里面。

Key.Original: Hydra is taking you around to the northwest corner. Viper-Green will attack from the south.
Key.Chinese: "九頭蛇"將帶你到它西北方的角落。"毒蛇-綠"將會從南方進攻。
Key.Chinesesimp: "九头蛇"将带你到它西北方的角落。"毒蛇-$1"将会从南方进攻。

Key.Original: They recommend you take up a firing position on the hill southeast of your insertion point. From there, you should be able to neutralize their critical defenses.
Key.Chinese: 他們需要你在你的投放點東南方設立射擊位置。從那邊，你應該就能殲滅敵人關鍵的防守設施。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们需要你在你的投放点东南方设立射击位置。从那边，你应该就能歼灭敌人关键的防守设施。

Key.Original: When you are ready, send Viper-Green the order to assault the complex. Once it is clear, Hydra will airlift you all back to base. Over.
Key.Chinese: 當你準備好時，向"毒蛇-綠"發送命令，他們便會開始進行攻擊。當肅清成功後，"九頭蛇"會把你帶回基地。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当你准备好时，向"毒蛇-$1"发送命令，他们便会开始进行攻击。当肃清成功后，"九头蛇"会把你带回基地。完毕。

Key.Original: UAV recon is picking up at least 12 on its thermals. However, it is not known whether there are more in the buildings or surrounding structures. Over.
Key.Chinese: 根據無人偵察機的熱成像顯示，至少會有12名敵人。然而，可能會有更多的敵人藏匿在附近的建築物中。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 根据无人侦察机的热成像显示，至少会有12名敌人。然而，可能会有更多的敌人藏匿在附近的建筑物中。完毕。

Key.Original: How many hostiles should I be expecting? Over.
Key.Chinese: 我大概會遭遇多少敵人?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我大概会遭遇多少敌人？完毕。

Key.Original: Copy.
Key.Chinese: 收到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。

Container.name: 25_ChangeOfPlan
Container.situation: player's commander informs them of the change in plan

Key.Original: Viper-Black, I have received an update from Griffin.
Key.Chinese: "毒蛇-黑"，我從"獅鷲"得知了些新訊息。
Key.Chinesesimp: "毒蛇-$1"，我从"狮鹫"那里得知了些新信息。

Key.Original: UAV recon located a larger insurgent camp on the mainland. Another Viper team is moving on it now, callsign Viper-Green.
Key.Chinese: 無人偵察機找到了一個大型的叛軍營地。另一隊"毒蛇"小隊正在前往該位置，呼號是"毒蛇-綠"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 无人侦察机找到了一个大型的叛军营地。另一个"毒蛇"小组正在前往该位置，呼号是"毒蛇-$1"。

Key.Original: You are to provide sniper support for Viper-Green's assault. If you are low on equipment, there is some in the helicopter. Standby for further information. Over.
Key.Chinese: 在"毒蛇-綠"進行突擊時你將擔當狙擊掩護。假如你有缺裝備，你可以看一下直升機裡面並補給下。請等待更多資訊。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在"毒蛇-$1"进行突击时你将担当狙击掩护。假如你缺乏装备，你可以看一下直升机里面并补给下。请等待更多信息。完毕。

Key.Original: Understood. Viper-Black standing by.
Key.Chinese: 了解。"毒蛇-黑"待命中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。"毒蛇-$1"待命中。

Container.name: 20_GetIn
Container.situation: rest of player's team arrives at the ao

Key.Original: Hydra is waiting, Sergeant.
Key.Chinese: "九頭蛇"正在等待，中士。
Key.Chinesesimp: "九头蛇"正在等待，中士。

Container.name: 15_LZClear
Container.situation: player reporting after clearing the newly discovered compound

Key.Original: Roger. We are inbound with Hydra.
Key.Chinese: 了解。我們正與"九頭蛇"一同過去。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。我们正与"九头蛇"一同过去。

Key.Original: I need you to speak with Griffin back at base. Hydra will airlift you once we arrive. We will stay and secure the area.
Key.Chinese: 我需要你回到基地親自向"獅鷲"進行匯報。"九頭蛇"抵達後會將你接回。我們會代替你鞏固該區域。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我需要你回到基地亲自向"狮鹫"进行汇报。"九头蛇"抵达后会将你接回。我们会代替你巩固该区域。

Key.Original: Viper-Red, Viper-Black. I encountered minimal enemy presence at the marked position. All hostiles neutralized.
Key.Chinese: "毒蛇-紅"，"毒蛇-黑"。我在標記的位置遭遇少量的敵人。所有敵人皆已殲滅。
Key.Chinesesimp: "毒蛇-$1"，"毒蛇-$1"。我在标记的位置遭遇少量的敌人。所有敌人皆已歼灭。

Key.Original: I have a small insurgent compound here. There is some equipment you may find interesting. In particular, an autonomous ground vehicle. Over.
Key.Chinese: 我在這裡找到一個叛軍的小營地。這裡有些裝備或許你會有興趣。特別是這裡有一臺地面無人載具。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我在这里找到一个叛军的小营地。这里有些装备或许你会有兴趣。特别是这里有一辆自律无人车。完毕。

Key.Original: Stay alert. Viper-Red out.
Key.Chinese: 請繼續保持警戒。"毒蛇-紅"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请继续保持警戒。"毒蛇-$1"通话完毕。

Container.name: 10_IntelFound
Container.situation: player reports in after finding the guerrilla intel

Key.Original: Understood. Dispatching Hydra to your position. Over.
Key.Chinese: 了解。正在派遣"九頭蛇"前往你的位置。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。正在派遣"九头蛇"前往你的位置。完毕。

Key.Original: Roger. Intel does not show any additional insurgent positions in your AO. However, I trust you to make that call. You are clear to investigate. Over.
Key.Chinese: 了解。情報顯示你附近並沒有其他的叛軍。然而，我相信你的判斷。你可以前往進行調查。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。情报显示你附近并没有其他的叛军。然而，我相信你的判断。你可以前往进行调查。完毕。

Key.Original: Commander, I have found something. Some maps and a laptop. The map appears to have some insurgent positions marked on it. Over.
Key.Chinese: 指揮官，我找到了些東西。一些地圖和筆記型電腦。地圖上標明了一些叛軍的所在位置。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 指挥官，我找到了些东西。一些地图和一台笔记本电脑。地图上标明了一些叛军的所在位置。完毕。

Key.Original: Commander, one of the positions is less than 700 meters northeast of my position.
Key.Chinese: 指揮官，其中一處地點位在我東北方700公尺左右。
Key.Chinesesimp: 指挥官，其中一处地点位在我东北方700米左右。

Key.Original: Requesting permission to scope it out myself before you send in Hydra. Over.
Key.Chinese: 在您派遣"九頭蛇"過來之前，請允許我前往調查。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在您派遣"九头蛇"过来之前，请允许我前往调查。完毕。

Key.Original: Copy. I will report back once I know more. Viper-Black out.
Key.Chinese: 收到。當我有結果時會向你回報。"毒蛇-黑"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。当我有结果时会向你回报。"毒蛇-$1"通话完毕。

Container.name: 05_VillaCleared
Container.situation: player reporting after he clears the fia hq

Key.Original: Copy, Viper-Black.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"毒蛇-黑"。

Key.Original: Viper-Red, Viper-Black. The insurgent HQ is clear of all hostiles. Searching for intel now. Over.
Key.Chinese: "毒蛇-紅"，"毒蛇-黑"。叛軍指揮部已肅清完成。正在搜索情報。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "毒蛇-$1"，"毒蛇-$1"。叛军指挥部已肃清完成。正在搜索情报。完毕。

Container.name: 01_Prologue
Container.situation: mission start, player is moving to objective

Key.Original: Roger. Report back when the insurgent HQ is clear. Over.
Key.Chinese: 了解。當叛軍指揮部肅清完成時請回報。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。当叛军指挥部肃清完成时请回报。完毕。

Key.Original: Viper-Black to Viper-Red, I am closing in on the FIA position. Preparing to engage. Over.
Key.Chinese: "毒蛇-黑"呼叫"毒蛇-紅"，我正靠近自由獨立同盟的位置。準備接敵。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "毒蛇-$1"呼叫"毒蛇-$1"，我正靠近 FIA 的阵地。准备接敌。完毕。

Key.Original: Copy. Viper-Black out.
Key.Chinese: 收到。"毒蛇-黑"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。"毒蛇-$1"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Utilize your marksman rifle and the new weapon stabilization features to carry out counter-insurgency operations against FIA forces.
Key.Chinese: 利用你的精準射手步槍與新的武器穩定功能，來對自由獨立同盟的叛亂行動進行打擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 利用你的精准射手步枪与新的武器稳定功能，来针对 FIA 实施反叛乱作战。

Key.Original: Southern Altis, near the coast
Key.Chinese: 阿爾蒂斯南方海岸附近
Key.Chinesesimp: 阿尔蒂斯南部，海岸附近

Key.Original: SHOWCASE: MARKSMEN - New weapons, Weapon customization, Weapon stabilization
Key.Chinese: 任務展示:精準射手-新武器，武器客製化，武器穩定
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务展示：精准射手—新武器，武器定制化，武器稳定

Key.Original: Insurgent camp
Key.Chinese: 叛軍營地
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军营地

Key.Original: Investigate
Key.Chinese: 調查
Key.Chinesesimp: 调查

Key.Original: Serpent
Key.Chinese: "海蛇"
Key.Chinesesimp: "海蛇"

Key.Original: Medusa 3
Key.Chinese: "美杜莎3"
Key.Chinesesimp: "美杜莎 3"

Key.Original: You have succeeded in delivering a significant blow to the FIA's operations.
Key.Chinese: 你的行動已成功對自由獨立同盟造成顯著的打擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的行动已成功对 FIA 造成显着的打击。

Key.Original: Insurgent HQ
Key.Chinese: 叛軍指揮部
Key.Chinesesimp: 叛军指挥部

Key.Original: Cooperate with %3Viper-Green%1 to clear the larger %2insurgent camp%1 north of Alikampos.
Key.Chinese: 與%3"毒蛇-綠"%1合作，共同掃蕩阿利卡姆波斯北方較大的%2叛軍營地%1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与%3"毒蛇-$1"%1合作，共同扫荡阿利卡姆波斯北方较大的%2叛军营地%1。

Key.Original: Clear the Camp
Key.Chinese: 肅清營地
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清营地

Key.Original:
1. Search the designated area and locate the FIA HQ.
2. Eliminate all hostiles in the vicinity.
3. Make a sweep for any valuable intel.
Key.Chinese:
1. 搜索指定區域，找到自由獨立同盟的指揮部。
2. 殲滅附近所有的敵人。
3. 搜索任何有用的情報。
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 搜索指定区域，找到 FIA 的指挥部。
2. 歼灭附近所有的敌人。
3. 搜索任何有用的情报。

Key.Original: You are to raid the FIA HQ and search for any valuable intel. According to the AAF, the FIA rely more on camouflage instead of strong defenses. Expect limited resistance.
Key.Chinese: 你將掃蕩自由獨立同盟的指揮部，並搜索任何有用的情報。根據AAF的情報，自由獨立同盟指揮部有著許多的偽裝多過他們所設的防守兵力。預期將會遇到有限的抵抗。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你要突袭 FIA 的指挥部，并搜索任何有用的情报。根据 AAF 的情报，FIA 主要依靠伪装而非强大的防御以自保。预期将会遇到有限的抵抗。

Key.Original: You have succeeded in delivering a significant blow to the FIA's operations. Unfortunately, Viper-Green was KIA.
Key.Chinese: 你的行動已成功對自由獨立同盟造成顯著的打擊。但不幸的是，"毒蛇-綠"卻在行動中陣亡了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的行动已成功对 FIA 造成显着的打击。但不幸的是，"毒蛇-$1"却在行动中阵亡了。

Key.Original: Serpent - attack
Key.Chinese: "海蛇"-攻擊
Key.Chinesesimp: "海蛇"-攻击

Key.Original:
Viper-Black - Your callsign.
Viper-Red - Your Team Leader.
Hydra - Transport helicopter.
Key.Chinese:
"毒蛇-黑"-你的呼號。
"毒蛇-紅"-你的小隊長。
"九頭蛇"-運輸直升機。
Key.Chinesesimp:
"毒蛇-$1"-你的呼号。
"毒蛇-$1"-你的小组长。
"九头蛇"-运输直升机。

Key.Original: You, Viper-Black, have been deployed to the southern peninsula as part of our on-going counter-insurgency operations against the FIA. Your objective this evening will be to sweep and clear a suspected FIA HQ located southwest of Sfaka.
Key.Chinese: 做為對抗自由獨立同盟叛亂行動的一部分，"毒蛇-黑"(你)將被佈署到半島南方並展開破壞自由獨立同盟的行動。你的任務就是在傍晚時分，前往肅清自由獨立同盟位在斯卡法西南方向的指揮部。
Key.Chinesesimp: 做为对抗 FIA 的反叛乱作战的一部分，"毒蛇-$1"（你）将被布署到半岛南方并开展行动。你今晚的任务就是在傍晚时分前往肃清 FIA 位在斯法卡西南的指挥部。

Key.Original: Await Hydra's arrival.
Key.Chinese: 等待"九頭蛇"抵達。
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待"九头蛇"抵达。

Key.Original: Missing In Action
Key.Chinese: 在行動中失蹤
Key.Chinesesimp: 在行动中失踪

Key.Original: Wait for Helicopter
Key.Chinese: 等待直升機
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待直升机

Key.Original: Sweep the FIA HQ for any valuable intel.
Key.Chinese: 搜索自由獨立同盟指揮部裡任何有用的情報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜索 FIA 指挥部里任何有用的情报。

Key.Original: Search for Intel
Key.Chinese: 搜索情報
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜索情报

Key.Original: Locate, sweep, and clear a local FIA HQ established somewhere %2southwest of Sfaka%1.
Key.Chinese: 搜尋並掃蕩位在%2斯卡法西南方向%1的自由獨立同盟指揮部。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜寻并扫荡位在%2斯法卡西南%1的 FIA 指挥部。

Key.Original: Raid the FIA HQ
Key.Chinese: 突襲自由獨立同盟指揮部
Key.Chinesesimp: 突袭 FIA 指挥部

Key.Original: Investigate %2grid 094-082%1. Clear the area of all hostiles before calling in Hydra.
Key.Chinese: 調查%2座標094-082%1。在呼叫"九頭蛇"之前優先肅清該座標區域。
Key.Chinesesimp: 调查%2座标094-082%1。在呼叫"九头蛇"之前优先肃清该座标区域。

Key.Original: Start the Attack
Key.Chinese: 開始攻擊
Key.Chinesesimp: 开始攻击

Key.Original: Move to the %2vantage point%1 above the %3insurgent camp%1, weaken the enemy defenses, and call in %4Viper-Green%1 when ready.
Key.Chinese: 移動到%3叛軍營地%1附近的%2有利位置%1，削弱他們的防禦，然後再呼叫%4"毒蛇-綠"%1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 移动到%3叛军营地%1附近的%2有利位置%1，削弱他们的防御，然后再呼叫%4"毒蛇-$1"%1。

Key.Original: Investigate Grid 094-082
Neutralize All Enemies
Key.Chinese: 殲滅所有敵人
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭所有敌人

Key.Original: %1 seconds per target
Key.Chinese: 每%1秒鐘一個敵人
Key.Chinesesimp: 每%1秒钟一个敌人

Key.Original: Hit the Nearby Target
Key.Chinese: 射擊附近的目標
Key.Chinesesimp: 射击附近的目标

Key.Original: Eliminate all virtual enemies. Note that hits do different damage based on where they hit the body. Use of body armor and helmets will reduce damage.
Key.Chinese: 殲滅所有虛擬敵人。並注意到射擊不同的部位會有不一樣的傷害值。有防彈背心與頭盔的部位會減免一些傷害。
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭所有虚拟敌人。并注意到射击不同的部位会有不一样的伤害值。有防弹背心与头盔的部位会减免一些伤害。

Key.Original: Hit the Distant Target
Key.Chinese: 射擊遠處的目標
Key.Chinesesimp: 射击远处的目标

Key.Original: Neutralize the virtual enemy. As the target is close to you and moving at a slower rate, you don't have to lead too much in order to score a hit.
Key.Chinese: 殲滅虛擬敵人。敵人正緩慢的朝你前進，你並不用太刻意操控槍枝的精準度便能射中目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭虚拟敌人。敌人正缓慢的朝你前进，你并不用太刻意操控枪枝的精准度便能射中目标。

Key.Original: Eliminate the Quad Drivers
Key.Chinese: 殲滅四輪摩托車駕駛
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭四轮摩托车驾驶

Key.Original: Neutralize the virtual enemy. As the distance to the target is considerably longer, hitting it will require more precise leading and timing of your shots.
Key.Chinese: 殲滅虛擬敵人。由於目標離你有一段距離，為要擊中目標，你必須仔細的控制槍枝穩定性。
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭虚拟敌人。由于目标离你有一段距离，为要击中目标，你必须仔细的控制枪枝稳定性。

Key.Original: Shoot Down the UAVs
Key.Chinese: 擊落空中無人載具
Key.Chinesesimp: 击落无人机

Key.Original: Eliminate both virtual enemies circling around you in the quad bikes.
Key.Chinese: 殲滅附近的四輪摩托車駕駛們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭驾驶四轮摩托车的虚拟敌人。

Key.Original: Take the Vest
Key.Chinese: 拿取背心
Key.Chinesesimp: 拿取背心

Key.Original: Shoot down both miniature UAVs. They present a small, fast moving target, which is difficult to hit. Weapons with a high rate of fire, such as machineguns, may make it considerably easier to hit such a target.
Key.Chinese: 擊落所有空中的微型無人載具。這麼微小的目標並且移動速度很快，這樣是很難命中的。使用開火速率較高的武器，像是機槍，便能較容易的擊落這種目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 击落全部两架微型无人机。它们的目标很小并且移动速度很快，很难击中。使用开火速率较高的武器如机枪便能较容易的击落这种目标。

Key.Original: Take the Backpack
Key.Chinese: 拿取背包
Key.Chinesesimp: 拿取背包

Key.Original:
Take the vest - it will come with some additional magazines.
The more protection the vests offer, the heavier they are and will significantly contribute to wearer's fatigue.
Key.Chinese:
拿取背心-裡面會有一些額外的彈匣。
保護性越好的背心，相對的也會越重，讓使用者更容易疲勞。
Key.Chinesesimp:
拿取背心—里面会有一些额外的弹匣。
保护性越好的背心，相对的也会越重，让使用者更容易疲劳。

Key.Original: Take Up a Firing Position
Key.Chinese: 就射擊位置
Key.Chinesesimp: 就射击位置

Key.Original: Take the backpack - it will come with 2 Medikits.
Key.Chinese: 拿取背包-它裡面裝有2個醫療包。
Key.Chinesesimp: 拿取背包—它里面装有2个医疗包。

Key.Original: Catch Your Breath
Key.Chinese: 調整呼吸
Key.Chinesesimp: 调整呼吸

Key.Original: Move to the indicated position. Try to manage your fatigue and to arrive in a ready-to-fire condition.
Key.Chinese: 移動到指定位置。試著在移動中管理你的疲勞程度，以利你就射擊位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 移动到指定位置。试着在移动中管理你的疲劳程度，以利你就射击位置。

Key.Original: Hit the Target
Key.Chinese: 射擊目標
Key.Chinesesimp: 射击目标

Key.Original: Catch your breath and decrease your fatigue level. Lowering your weapon and going crouch/prone will decrease your fatigue faster.
Key.Chinese: 調整呼吸並降低疲勞程度。使用蹲下/趴下，將有效增加降低疲勞程度的速度。
Key.Chinesesimp: 调整呼吸并降低疲劳程度。使用蹲下/趴下，将有效增加降低疲劳程度的速度。

Key.Original: Hit the Target
Key.Chinese: 射擊目標
Key.Chinesesimp: 射击目标

Key.Original: Hit the indicated part of the target while keeping your fatigue low.
Key.Chinese: 射擊指定的目標並同時保持低疲勞度。
Key.Chinesesimp: 射击指定的目标并同时保持低疲劳度。

Key.Original: Hit the Target
Key.Chinese: 射擊目標
Key.Chinesesimp: 射击目标

Key.Original: Hit the indicated part of the target while maintaining a medium fatigue level. Aiming will be more difficult, but you can hold your breath for temporary stabilization.
Key.Chinese: 射擊指定的目標並同時保持中等的疲勞度。瞄準將會變難，但你可以透過憋氣來暫時提高武器的穩定性。
Key.Chinesesimp: 射击指定的目标并同时保持中等的疲劳度。瞄准将会变难，但你可以透过憋气来暂时提高武器的稳定性。

Key.Original: Enter the Shooting Range
Key.Chinese: 進入靶場
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入靶场

Key.Original: Hit the indicated part of the target while maintaining the maximum fatigue level. Aiming will be very difficult and you will only be able to hold your breath for a very short time period.
Key.Chinese: 射擊指定的目標並同時保持最大的疲勞度。瞄準將會變得非常困難，憋氣也只能憋一下下。
Key.Chinesesimp: 射击指定的目标并同时保持最大的疲劳度。瞄准将会变得非常困难，憋气也只能憋一下下。

Key.Original: Clear the Shooting Range
Key.Chinese: 肅清靶場
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清靶场

Key.Original: Enter the shooting range and prepare for a live fire exercise.
Key.Chinese: 進入靶場並準備進行實彈射擊演習。
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入靶场并准备进行实弹射击演习。

Key.Original: Clear the Shooting Range
Key.Chinese: 肅清靶場
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清靶场

Key.Original: Move through the shooting range and eliminate all enemies. At the end, you'll see your average time needed to eliminate a target with your current weapon.
Key.Chinese: 通過靶場並肅清所有敵人。在結束時，你可以查看你使用的當前武器，擊殺一個敵人所需的時間是多少。
Key.Chinesesimp: 通过靶场并肃清所有敌人。在结束时，你可以查看你使用的当前武器，击杀一个敌人所需的时间是多少。

Key.Original: Neutralize the Gunner
Key.Chinese: 殲滅槍手
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭枪手

Key.Original: Move through the shooting range again with a more cumbersome weapon.
Key.Chinese: 使用更麻煩的武器來通過靶場。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用更麻烦的武器来通过靶场。

Key.Original: Eliminate Hidden Enemies
Key.Chinese: 殲滅隱藏的敵人
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭隐藏的敌人

Key.Original: Adjust your stance so that you can see, and eliminate, the gunner on the other side of the wall.
Key.Chinese: 調整你的姿態，你便能看見並瞄準牆另一邊的槍手。
Key.Chinesesimp: 调整你的姿态，你便能看见并瞄准墙另一边的枪手。

Key.Original: Deploy Your Machinegun
Key.Chinese: 佈署你的機槍
Key.Chinesesimp: 架设你的机枪

Key.Original: Adjust your stance and eliminate both of the hidden enemies behind the low wall.
Key.Chinese: 調整你的姿態，你便能看見並瞄準矮牆另一邊的槍手們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 调整你的姿态，你便能看见并瞄准矮墙另一边的枪手们。

Key.Original: Eliminate Tank Crews
Key.Chinese: 殲滅坦克組員
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭坦克乘员

Key.Original: Move closer to the virtual blocks in front of you and deploy your machinegun.
Key.Chinese: 靠近你前方的虛擬方塊並架設你的機槍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 靠近你前方的虚拟方块并架设你的机枪。

Key.Original: Stabilize Your Rifle
Key.Chinese: 穩定你的步槍
Key.Chinesesimp: 稳定你的步枪

Key.Original: Eliminate all enemy crewmen before they reach the tanks.
Key.Chinese: 在敵方組員抵達坦克前殲滅他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在敌方乘员抵达坦克前歼灭他们。

Key.Original: Hit All Targets
Key.Chinese: 射擊所有目標
Key.Chinesesimp: 射击所有目标

Key.Original: Aim your weapon over the virtual blocks to achieve a stable firing position.
Key.Chinese: 透過虛擬方塊瞄準並穩定你的步槍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 透过虚拟方块瞄准并稳定你的步枪。

Key.Original: Eliminate Targets
Key.Chinese: 殲滅目標
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭目标

Key.Original: Hit all targets from a stabilized position.
Key.Chinese: 從穩定的位置射擊所有目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 从稳定的位置射击所有目标。

Key.Original: Eliminate Targets
Key.Chinese: 殲滅目標
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭目标

Key.Original: Switch to long-range optics and eliminate all targets along the western tower.
Key.Chinese: 切換成長距離瞄準鏡，並使用它來殲滅西方塔附近的敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 切换成长距离瞄准镜，并使用它来歼灭西方塔附近的敌人。

Key.Original: Eliminate Targets
Key.Chinese: 殲滅目標
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭目标

Key.Original: Switch to optics, zoom in and eliminate all targets along the northern tower.
Key.Chinese: 切換瞄準鏡，並使用它來殲滅北方塔附近的敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 切换瞄准镜，并使用它来歼灭北方塔附近的敌人。

Key.Original: Disable All Explosives
Key.Chinese: 解除所有炸藥
Key.Chinesesimp: 解除所有炸药

Key.Original: Switch to optics, zero your weapon to the correct distance and eliminate all targets along the eastern tower.
Key.Chinese: 切換瞄準鏡，並正確歸零你的槍枝於正確的距離上，使用它來殲滅東方塔附近的敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 切换瞄准镜，并正确归零你的枪支于正确的距离上，使用它来歼灭东方塔附近的敌人。

Key.Original: Enter the Shooting Range
Key.Chinese: 進入靶場
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入靶场

Key.Original: Use your flashlight to locate and disable all nearby explosives.
Key.Chinese: 使用你的手電筒尋找並解除附近所有的炸藥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用你的手电筒寻找并解除附近所有的炸药。

Key.Original: Clear the Shooting Range
Key.Chinese: 肅清靶場
Key.Chinesesimp: 肃清靶场

Key.Original: Enter the shooting range and prepare for a live fore exercise.
Key.Chinese: 進入靶場並準備進行實彈射擊演習。
Key.Chinesesimp: 进入靶场并准备进行实弹射击演习。

Key.Original: Move through the shooting range and eliminate all targets.
Key.Chinese: 穿過靶場並擊倒所有目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 穿过靶场并击倒所有目标。

Key.Original: Deployed
Key.Chinese: 已佈署
Key.Chinesesimp: 已布署

Key.Original: Stabilized
Key.Chinese: 已穩定
Key.Chinesesimp: 已稳定

Key.Original: Carbine
Key.Chinese: 卡賓槍
Key.Chinesesimp: 卡宾枪

Key.Original: Unstabilized
Key.Chinese: 不穩定
Key.Chinesesimp: 不稳定

Key.Original: Undeployed
Key.Chinese: 未佈署
Key.Chinesesimp: 未架设

Key.Original: Weapon sway increased
Key.Chinese: 武器搖晃程度增加
Key.Chinesesimp: 武器摇晃程度增加

Key.Original: Weapon sway maximized
Key.Chinese: 武器搖晃程度最大
Key.Chinesesimp: 武器摇晃程度最大

Key.Original: Weapon sway minimized
Key.Chinese: 武器搖晃程度最小
Key.Chinesesimp: 武器摇晃程度最小

Key.Original: Weapon Handling I
Key.Chinese: 武器操控I
Key.Chinesesimp: 武器操控I

Key.Original: Light Machine Gun
Key.Chinese: 輕機槍
Key.Chinesesimp: 轻机枪

Key.Original: Basics
Key.Chinese: 基礎
Key.Chinesesimp: 基础

Key.Original: Moving Targets
Key.Chinese: 移動目標
Key.Chinesesimp: 移动目标

Key.Original: Weapon Handling II
Key.Chinese: 武器操控II
Key.Chinesesimp: 武器操控 II

Key.Original: Weapon sway
Key.Chinese: 武器搖晃
Key.Chinesesimp: 武器摇晃

Key.Original: Weapon Inertia
Key.Chinese: 武器慣性
Key.Chinesesimp: 武器惯性

Key.Original: Adjusted Stances
Key.Chinese: 調整姿態
Key.Chinesesimp: 调整姿态

Key.Original: Weapon Handling III
Key.Chinese: 武器操控III
Key.Chinesesimp: 武器操控 III

Key.Original: Weapon Stabilization
Key.Chinese: 武器穩定
Key.Chinesesimp: 武器稳定

Key.Original: Optics
Key.Chinese: 瞄準鏡
Key.Chinesesimp: 瞄准镜

Key.Original: Barrel Attachments
Key.Chinese: 槍管附件
Key.Chinesesimp: 枪管附件

Key.Original: CoF: Purple 1
Key.Chinese: 靶場:紫色1
Key.Chinesesimp: 靶场：紫色1

Key.Original: CoF: Purple 2
Key.Chinese: 靶場:紫色2
Key.Chinesesimp: 靶场：紫色2

Key.Original: CoF: Purple 3
Key.Chinese: 靶場:紫色3
Key.Chinesesimp: 靶场：紫色3

Key.Original: An improvised medium distance shooting range, sporting varied target groups at the Xirolimni dry dam.
Key.Chinese: 一個即興的中距離靶場，在克西羅里姆尼乾枯的水壩中來回穿梭搜尋目標群。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个即兴的中距离靶场，在干枯的克西罗里姆尼水坝中来回穿梭的运动靶群。

Key.Original: An event during which you move between shooting stations on a quad bike and encounter a wide range of sharpshooter challenges.
Key.Chinese: 在不同射擊站之間，你將使用四輪摩托車來代步，並接受各種精準射手挑戰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在不同射击站之间，你将使用四轮摩托车来代步，并接受各种精准射手挑战。

Key.Original: An artificial hostage situation at the Ghost Hotel compound.
Key.Chinese: 在廢棄的飯店大樓中模擬人質事件。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在废弃的饭店大楼中模拟人质事件。

Key.Original: Sharpshooter: a set of drills focused on weapon stabilization
Key.Chinese: 精準射手:在不同的靶場中練習武器穩定性的操控
Key.Chinesesimp: 精准射手：在不同的靶场中练习武器稳定性的操控

Key.Original: Purple (Firing Drills)
Key.Chinese: 紫色(射擊訓練)
Key.Chinesesimp: 紫色（射击训练）

Key.Original: Special
Key.Chinese: 特別
Key.Chinesesimp: 特别

Key.Original: Purple
Key.Chinese: 紫色
Key.Chinesesimp: 紫色
